alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 19 at 8:39AM EST until February 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is falling, but will continue to run high through early this afternoon. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 1 PM.
